name: Soup!
description:
Soup! – This is a simple but addictive puzzle game, you just need to find the same items to cope with the mess and open the drawing. The game contains 20 stunning drawings, elementary simple controls and excellent music that will help you enter the state of flow. This game is designed to relax you and cheer you up!

Features Of the Game


  • Twenty drawings
  • Beautiful graphics
  • Relaxing music
  • Achievements
